revision.text: Possibly: Letters of the late Rev. Mr. Laurence Sterne, to his most intimate friends. With a fragment in the manner of Rabelais. To which are prefixed, memoirs of his life and family. Written by himself, and published / by his daughter, Mrs. Medalle. In three volumes. Vol. 111 [only]. (London : Printed for T. Becket, 1775). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1301580~S1
